I bought these almost exactly 4 months ago, mostly for work. I was skeptical at first, but my previous shoes had been hurting my feet. It took a couple days to get used to, but I ended up really enjoying them! I'm a massage therapist, and these provided great flexibility, grip, and comfort while working. I did think it was odd that I could feel a pattern on the inside of the soles through the padding.  Well that ended up being the problem. After finding holes in the heels of multiple socks, I checked the inside of the shoes and found that both had holes in the padding of the heels inside, in the shape of the aforementioned pattern. They were good while they lasted but I really don't want to have to replace them every few months.

评论概述: Works well enough for everyday use!
评论详情: The shoe was for my husband. He tells me it's a pretty good shoe and lasted well enough considering all the physical labor he does at the warehouse. Granted already in the few shorts months of having it. It has been through the ringer on the rubber. Which has been grinded flat from walking and pushing on the concrete in the heat for roughly 6 hours a day and in the tire shop. Considering all he does. He did love the shoe and wanted the rubber to be a bit thicker to last.  Pros Comfortable Flat Zero drop breathe easy on the feet meant to be an everyday shoe not a work shoe.  Cons according to him Not meant for hard labor The zipper doesn't zip right anymore Rubber not meant for the hottest of days  All in all he rates it well enough to consider buying the not zipper form of the shoe.

These shoes are very comfortable, some days i can just walk around the house hardly noticing them. They seem to be made a good quality and very flexible. It hardly feels like im wearing shoes and while I haven't gotten to see how well they deal with water they have been easy to clean from minor spills. Very few complaints. One the zipper pull is quite hard and i like to sit crosslegged either on the ground or in chairs and it can dig into my foot or the chair im sitting on. Also the zipper isnt stiff or held still by anything so sometimes my pace will make it tick back and forth. Last the laces are pretty long. Not a huge impact but i ended up replacing them with elastic no shows anyways. Didnt make too much sense to have the laces AND zipper for me. All in all very good shoes. Just have to wait and see how long they last.

评论概述: Loose in the heel but very comfortable; nice and wide
评论详情: Overall I like these - good price compared to others, they are comfortable and fit well - except for the heel, which is loose and for me it needs to be a good half-inch higher, too. I am used to going barefoot inside and outside a lot of the time so to have a "barefoot" shoe seems a bit contradictory but I do like the idea, and the execution is good too especially since I have wide forefeet.  So I bought some leather heel pads and so far those help a lot, although they are really meant to stick on leather and not fabric. Only time will tell if they'll stay on!  Would I buy these again? It's a solid "maybe" for me, for now LOL. I would shop around for ones that had a good heel fit, but that's hard to do without trying them on first...
Natural,zero drop shoes keep my feet happy, the side zipper means you tie them once and slip on and off easily-a real bonus
I'm getting a bit older as I have shrink from 6'2" to 6 '1", I think my hight has gone into my feet. These shoes are perfect. Long enough and wide enough. I will buy different colors.
Great choice.

This product uses a grid pattern on the heel to make the shoes look like they have thicker souls than they have. This grid pattern causes pressure on your feet and makes it so your heels will hurt after a while. Also, they are not very good in any weather other than dry. Any amount of water or snow will get your feet wet. The only saving grace is the kipper on the side of the shoe. I can't wear these for a prolonged walk, or any kind of hike. I would advise against getting these if you plan on walking in them for more than half a mile.

I loved the product in the beginning, the reason i got it its because its supposed to be a good fit for wide feet and mine tend to get swollen, and the idea of a zipper seemed great not to have to deal with shoelaces all the time, but the zipper broke and now i cant use the shoes anymore
